text: Șopot may refer to following rivers in Romania: * , a tributary of the Bega in Timiș County * , a tributary of the Olt in the city of Slatina, Olt County * , a tributary of the Valea Mare in Timiș County == See also == * Șopotu, a tributary of the Nera in Caraș-Severin County, Romania * Sopot (river), a tributary of the Tanew, Poland * Sopot (disambiguation) * Šopot, a village in the city of Benkovac, Croatia
title: Șopot
